meanings.sent1: The group of lunkheads couldn't figure out how to open the door.
meanings.sent2: She always avoided hanging out with lunkheads like him.
meanings.sent3: The lunkheads tried to play chess with missing pieces, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness turned him into a lunkhead, unable to see reason.
meanings.sent5: The image of a lunkhead with a light bulb above his head symbolized a lack of intelligence.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with lunkheads chatting loudly.
meanings.sent2: The lunkheads gathered around the table, eager to share their stories.
meanings.sent3: The lunkheads all wore matching hats, looking quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of lunkheads, each one lost in their own world.
meanings.sent5: The parade of lunkheads marched down the street, drawing curious glances from passersby.
